content:
RAPHAEL SCOTT
Technical Product Manager

[raphael.scott@gmail.com](mailto:raphael.scott@gmail.com)
555-555-5555
[www.linkedin.com/raphaelscott](http://www.linkedin.com/raphaelscott)
New York, NY

Summary
=======

Experienced Technical Product Manager with a proven track record of delivering results. Skilled in IT consulting, leading cross-functional teams, and driving revenue growth. Proven ability to increase profits by implementing new automated processes, streamlining operations, and building strong relationships with clients and partners.

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
=======================

Technical Product Manager
Amazon
01/2019 - Present
New York, NY

* Led the development of a product roadmap that generated $10M in additional annual revenue
* Implemented a communication methodology that improved partner relations and streamlined contract negotiations
* Assembled a team that restructured a failing customer acquisition platform, resulting in a 118% increase in sales cycle

Technical Product Manager
Comcast
01/2017 - 01/2019
New York, NY

* Developed and launched an automated process that increased profits by $20M
* Secured new partnerships that expanded operations to 3 additional cities
* Collaborated with engineers to create a professional development initiative

IT Consultant
PwC
01/2015 - 01/2017
New York, NY

* Trained Python engineers on best practices and internal server operations
* Implemented a CRM system for partners, resulting in a 23% increase in sales revenue
* Streamlined the quarterly assessment process, reducing expenses by 14%

IT Business Analyst
Deloitte
01/2013 - 01/2015
New York, NY

* Designed and implemented solutions for customers, reducing waiting and administrative times by 40%
* Built long-term relationships with clients that continue to this day
* Consistently provided consulting services that saved an average of $250K per year for clients

Strengths
=========

* Analytical Thinking: Able to identify and track key performance indicators resulting in an average of 35% profit increase for clients
* Communication: Strong engineering background enables effective collaboration with engineers and developers
* Problem Solving: Led teams in solving high-priority company problems for 3 consecutive years

TECHNICAL SKILLS
================

* Scrum
* Product Development
* UX Design
* Tableau
* JIRA
* Python
* Kanban

Education
=========

Master of Business Administration
Stevens Institute of Technology
01/2008 - 01/2012
Hoboken, NJ

Bachelor of Science, Industrial Engineering
University of California, Berkeley
01/2004 - 01/2008
Berkeley, CA
